heading: Endless Gates Dungeon Guide
content: Endless Gates is plagued by Fallen Lunatics, which can blow you up before you can say boom. It is possibly the most confusing dungeon of all time, having multiple portals leading to the same area multiple times. It is generally not great for farming mostly due to the presence of ultra-tanky Animus Carriers, and is not currently a possible . That being said, there are several high EXP monsters here. Scourge of the Land is an easy-to-defeat meat piñata. This dungeon unlocks the , a solid offensive aspect for Werebear Druid. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
